Texts.Chs: 把^green;网络射手^reset;带到^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给我。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Web Shooter^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 如果你觉得大蜘蛛是个威胁，你可以试着干掉一头^orange;巨型蜘蛛^reset;...它们是银河系最大的蜘蛛。你敢不敢！ 杀死一头^orange;巨型蜘蛛^reset;，我会很佩服你的。
Texts.Eng: If you thought large spiders were a threat, try taking out a ^orange;Megarachnid^reset;...they're the largest spiders in the galaxy. I dare you, in fact! Kill a ^orange;Megarachnid^reset; and you'll get my respect.
